```{r}
library(tidyverse)

nfl_raw <- read_csv("data/2018-08-28/nfl_2010-2017.csv") %>% 
  select(-X1)

theme_set(theme_light())


```

```{r}
nfl_raw %>% 
  filter(position == "QB") %>% 
  group_by(name) %>%
  mutate(sum_pass_yds = sum(pass_yds)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(sum_pass_yds)) %>% 
  distinct(name, .keep_all = TRUE)
  
nfl_raw %>% 
  group_by(game_year) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(rush_yds), !is.na(pass_yds), !is.na(rec_yds)) %>% 
  summarize(rush_mean = mean(rush_yds), 
            pass_mean = mean(pass_yds),
            rec_mean = mean(rec_yds)) %>% 
  gather(metric, value, rush_mean : rec_mean) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(game_year, value, color = metric)) + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()


  geom_line(aes(game_year, pass_mean), color = "blue") + 
  geom_line(aes(game_year, rec_mean)) 

            

```
